p: The sample of T. serrulatus aerial parts was collected during flowering season from Emba Alaje mountain area, Emba Alaje District of South Tigray, Ethiopia (located at 13° 00′ North latitude and 39° 20′East longitude) in the month October 2018. The plant was authenticated by Getinet Masresha (taxonomist) at the Department of Biology, University of Gondar, Ethiopia. A voucher specimen (TH-001/2011) was placed for reference in the University of Gondar’s herbarium.
